item.title: SSDs Go Brrr
item.description: Most of my experience with computers involve passed down laptops or unused computers at home. I’ve always assumed that they’re just painfully slow because of the CPU and stuck with it. Since I only code on the desktop and watch some videos from time to time, it never bothered me. Up until I got into Android development (with Kotlin) again, after getting tired of Flutter’s limitations, that’s when I notice how much of a bottleneck the hard drive speed is.
